meanings.definition: To remove the reproductive organs of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian will desex the cat to prevent unwanted litters.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to desex pets to control the pet population.
meanings.sent3: After the surgery to desex the dog, it will no longer be able to have puppies.
meanings.sent4: The decision to desex the rabbit was made to avoid overpopulation in the shelter.
meanings.sent5: The act of desexing helps reduce the number of stray animals in the community.

meanings.definition: To render an animal infertile by removing its reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The shelter desexes all animals before they are put up for adoption.
meanings.sent2: Many pet owners choose to desex their pets for health and behavioral reasons.
meanings.sent3: The farmer decided to desex the goat to prevent unwanted breeding.
meanings.sent4: The decision to desex the horse was made to improve its behavior and focus.
meanings.sent5: The process of desexing is a common procedure in veterinary clinics.
